row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_DM.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PACKAGESTATE_SET_BACKUP.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &UC4RB_RM_OUT_PKG_ROLLBACK_ST# = GET_VAR (&variableName#,"&BACKUPKEY#") :DELETE_VAR &variableName#, "&BACKUPKEY#"
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode !
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm SetPackageState -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -pkg "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_ID#" -n "&UC4RB_RM_OUT_PKG_ROLLBACK_ST#" -c "" ? -nm "SKIP" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm SetPackageState -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -pkg "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_ID#" -n "&UC4RB_RM_OUT_PKG_ROLLBACK_ST#" -c "" ? -nm "SKIP" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
